scripts.synth:dev: cdk synth devCognito devCoachAthleteLambdaStack devTrainingEventLambdaStack --profile CruxRouteDev
scripts.deploy:dev: cdk deploy devCognito devCoachAthleteLambdaStack devTrainingEventLambdaStack --profile CruxRouteDev --require-approval never --progress events --outputs-file ../web/src/app/aws-deploy-dev-config.json
scripts.destroy:dev: cdk destroy devCognito devCoachAthleteLambdaStack devTrainingEventLambdaStack --profile CruxRouteDev --force
scripts.synth:prod: cdk synth prodCloudFront prodCognito prodCoachAthleteLambdaStack prodTrainingEventLambdaStack --profile CruxRouteProd
scripts.deploy:prod: cdk deploy prodCloudFront prodCognito prodCoachAthleteLambdaStack prodTrainingEventLambdaStack --profile CruxRouteProd --require-approval never --progress events --outputs-file ../web/src/app/aws-deploy-prod-config.json
